name: Abduct All Things
description:
ABDUCT ALL THINGS!

(This is not the full game)

Abduct you way up the food chain from Baby cows to Large Tanks, Dodge Missiles and Environment in the Farms, City, Desert and Area 51.

Play story mode with 5 zones, and 19 levels!

Play in classic Frenzy mode or Endless mode!

Earn points for free to spend in the shop for upgrades and cosmetics!

Thank you all for checking it out!

!Instructions!

WASD = Movement

SHIFT = Laser Beam

UFO HAS 6 STAGES,

STAGE 1 = BABY COWS ONLY

STAGE 2 = GROWN COWS & PAST BEINGS

STAGE 3 = SHEEP & PAST BEINGS

STAGE 4 = HUMANS  & PAST BEINGS

STAGE 5 = CIA & PAST BEINGS

STAGE 6 = TANKS & PAST BEINGS

SORRY FOR NO IN GAME EXPLANATION

-in development- 

Next update will include the finished game, sorry !

if experiencing lag, resize window by dragging it to the very top of your screen.
